mapper.select: select id,teamName,introduction,status,members,createTime,lastUpdate,teamPicturePath,maxPicturePath,midPicturePath,minPicturePath from bb_team ORDER BY lastUpdate DESC

select bt.id,bt.teamName,bt.introduction,bt.status,bt.members,bt.createTime,bt.lastUpdate,bt.teamPicturePath, bt.maxPicturePath,bt.midPicturePath,bt.minPicturePath from bb_team bt, bb_team_member btm where bt.id=btm.teamId and btm.userId=#{userId} ORDER BY bt.lastUpdate DESC
